name: Deep Cut
description: A dual conical tank buster that targets the two players with the highest enmity. This attack also applies a magic vulnerability debuff and a bleed effect that lasts for 15 seconds.

name: Play A-side / Play B-side
description: The boss stores a mechanic to be resolved later. A-side is a role-based spread, while B-side consists of light party stacks.

name: Play A-side / Play B-side
description: The boss stores a mechanic to be resolved later. A-side is a role-based spread, while B-side consists of light party stacks.

name: Celebrate Good Times
description: A raid-wide magical damage hit that is quickly followed by Disco Infernal.

name: Disco Infernal
description: A follow-up raid-wide magical damage hit that initiates a challenging phase of the fight. A checkerboard pattern of AoEs will appear on the floor.

name: Play A-side / Play B-side
description: The boss stores another mechanic to be resolved later, either a role-based spread (A-side) or light party stacks (B-side).

name: Celebrate Good Times
description: A raid-wide magical damage hit.

name: Deep Cut
description: A second instance of the dual conical tank buster on the two highest enmity players. Inflicts magic vulnerability and a bleed.

name: Get Down!
description: A mechanic where players need to perform a specific action, likely avoiding AoEs or moving to a designated safe spot.

name: Minor Freak Out / Freak Out
description: A series of raid-wide damage pulses. Pairs of minor and major with the same times should tank these together.

name: Eighth Beats / Quarter Beats
description: Eighth Beats requires players to spread out to avoid overlapping AoEs. Quarter Beats requires players to stack in pairs to share damage.

name: Eighth Beats / Quarter Beats
description: Eighth Beats requires players to spread out to avoid overlapping AoEs. Quarter Beats requires players to stack in pairs to share damage.

name: Play A-side / Play B-side
description: The boss stores a mechanic to be resolved later. A-side is a role-based spread, while B-side consists of light party stacks.

name: Deep Cut
description: A third instance of the dual conical tank buster on the two highest enmity players. Inflicts magic vulnerability and a bleed.

name: Celebrate Good Times
description: A raid-wide magical damage hit.

name: Eighth Beats / Quarter Beats
description: Eighth Beats requires players to spread out to avoid overlapping AoEs. Quarter Beats requires players to stack in pairs to share damage.

name: Disco Infernal
description: Another instance of the raid-wide magical damage that begins a challenging phase with checkerboard AoEs.

name: Back-up Dance
description: Adds appear and perform a dance, indicating mechanics that the party needs to bait.

name: Back-up Dance
description: Adds appear and perform a dance, indicating mechanics that the party needs to bait.

name: Play A-side / Play B-side
description: The boss stores a final mechanic to be resolved. A-side is a role-based spread, while B-side consists of light party stacks.

name: Celebrate Good Times
description: A raid-wide magical damage hit.

name: Get Down!
description: A second instance of the mechanic where players need to perform a specific action to avoid damage.

name: Back-up Dance
description: A second set of adds appear to perform a dance, indicating another set of mechanics.

name: Deep Cut
description: The final instance of the dual conical tank buster on the two highest enmity players. Inflicts magic vulnerability and a bleed.

name: Eighth Beats / Quarter Beats
description: Eighth Beats requires players to spread out to avoid overlapping AoEs. Quarter Beats requires players to stack in pairs to share damage.

name: Funky Floor
description: A final, more complex version of the checkerboard AoE pattern.

name: Eighth Beats / Quarter Beats
description: A final instance of Eighth Beats or Quarter Beats, requiring either spreading or stacking.

name: Celebrate Good Times
description: A raid-wide magical damage hit before the enrage.

name: Celebrate Good Times
description: A final raid-wide magical damage hit before the enrage.

name: Hi-NRG Fever
description: Enrage sequence. A series of high-damage raid-wide hits that will wipe the party if the boss is not defeated in time.
